intro.about-me-1: I've spent my life in pursuit of making things - so it didn't surprise anyone that I fell in love with programming.
intro.about-me-2: I'm most experienced in new-age things like Python and Javascript, but familiar with the classics like Java and C++.
intro.about-me-3: I'm particularly interested in web technologies, and enjoy full stack development.
intro.about-me-4: Whenever I can, I love to help friends & charities bring their ideas to life, and explore new web frameworks & programming ideas.
